rComments: Super intelligent individual, which comes across in lectures.  Definitely on the stricter side (no phones, mandatory attendance, etc.), however he is very understanding. Overall pretty good professor who knows his stuff!

This man knows his stuff. Unfortunately, the material he lectures on is lost in translation due to vague powerpoints, and digressive rants. He discusses his personal matters openly which further takes away from his authoritythe purpose of his lectures. Seems like an intelligent person, but I would not recommend his classes.
